page.title: 09Life in Chalfont St. Peter
page.content: During a shower and a shave at seven,Dad listens to Radio 4 and then rushes down to breakfast. We all have breakfast in a rush then dash off to school or work. Dad works at Chalfont Park.British Alcan is owned by a Canadian multi national company.Originally there were two big {aluminuim} {companies} but as British {industry} declined there was not enough {business} for both.So they merged to make British Alcan.My father helped to plan this merger.The new headquarters are in Chalfont St.Peter, so we had to move here. This is not unusual 73% of my class werenÂ£t born here.Buckinghamshire is the fastest growing county in Britain, because the most prosperous part of England is the south east. My father often works late.His day always ends with the midnight news.
